column4: Hi guys.. good work on the distro.. i've managed to get the i386 version running on my AMD64.. but i'm having a couple of issues..
the most annoying one is that nautilus windows to display files take about 3-4 MINUTEs (no exageration) to show up? is this ia known bug?? i cant find it on bugzilla??
what kind of computer do you have?
it sound a little bit wierd
